Author: Anthony
Comment:
If it is a coincidence, it’s one that affects us too. Any time we’re happily out and about and away from news media for a while – something big kicks off.

Now as we were at home all weekend, this one must be your fault!

Author: Switzerland
Comment: Well , yea , it is a co-incidence if u ask me . These things shouldnt bother you much . Maybe you should Visit Switzerland sometime . No such problems there !
